title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: The dialog's details section has several issues. First, the name validation function seems to be duplicated on the first page. Second, the first and second column in the dialog could be merged to improve the layout.
OB: a. The buttons in the dialog are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog appears huge for methods with many parameters.
